Game.Name: Ninja Ryuuken Den (Japan) (En,Ja,Zh)
Game.plot: Ninja Action! The stage is set for conspiracy, mystery and evil in America. Come with Ninja Ryu as he takes you on his fateful journey. The unique cinema display system develops the story stage by stage. You piece together the puzzle, while watching the movie-like graphics. Decide what action to take. Use the secret sword and items collected during the action scenes to fight your way to the goal!Cheat: 99 Art StrengthAfter losing all your lives, wait for the continue screen and hold Up + I + II until you hear a sound. Once you do, continue the game and you'll have 99 Art Strength.
